title: Womannequin
summaries: The Womannequin is a decorative furniture item that can be used to display armor and vanity items, (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) as well as accessories and dyes.

This content is transcluded from Mannequin.On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, items can be placed on a Womannequin by pressing the ⚷ Open / Activate button on it, which opens a small set of inventory-like slots beneath the player's main inventory. There are three slots for helmet, shirt, and pants, and five slots for accessories. In addition, each slot has an associated dye slot underneath it. Placing items in these slots immediately displays them on the Womannequin.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, items can be placed on a Womannequin by pressing the ⚒ Use / Attack button anywhere on it, which places the item currently held by the player on the Womannequin. If there is already an item in the same slot on the Womannequin, it will be replaced and dropped. Items can also be removed with a pickaxe or drill.

Womannequins can only be removed if no items are placed on them. On <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console</linked>, they can always be destroyed by <linked>explosives</linked>, however.
The Womannequin always displays armor and clothing in their female sprite forms. The <linked>Mannequin</linked> can be used to display them in their male counterparts.

result.value: [img:Womannequin]Womannequin(Desktop, Console, Old-gen console and Mobile versions)
